parameters.name: AltF
parameters.description: Presumed emission altitude (also quickly shows times when images are available).

parameters.name: Image_Counts
parameters.description: Earth Camera UV Images (quasi-log cnts), small format display with click-expand (~1 min. res.)

parameters.name: Image_CountsF
parameters.description: --> Larger format display with click-expand, no geographic registration.

parameters.name: Mapped_ImageO
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) With geographic map overlay

parameters.name: Mapped_Image
parameters.description: --> [DO NOT USE: UNDER-DEVELOPMENT] Test Display

parameters.name: Mapped_ImageP
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Azimuthal projection to geographic (fixed sun orientation)

parameters.name: Mapped_ImageM
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Azimuthal projection to magnetic LT and invariant lat

parameters.name: Movie_Image
parameters.description: (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Movie display of images, no geographic registration.

parameters.name: Mapped_MovieO
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) With geographic grid overlay

parameters.name: Mapped_MovieP
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Azimuthal projection to geographic (fixed sun orientation)

parameters.name: Mapped_MovieM
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Azimuthal projection to magnetic LT and invariant lat

parameters.name: IImage_Counts
parameters.description: Earth Camera UV Images (kRay), small format display with click-expand (~1 min. res.)

parameters.name: IImage_CountsF
parameters.description: --> Larger format display with click-expand, no geographic registration.

parameters.name: Mapped_IImageO
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) With geographic grid overlay

parameters.name: Mapped_IImageP
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Azimuthal projection to geographic (fixed sun orientation)

parameters.name: Mapped_IImageM
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Azimuthal projection to magnetic LT and invariant lat

parameters.name: Movie_IImage
parameters.description: (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Movie display of images, no geographic registration.

parameters.name: Mapped_IMovieO
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) With geographic grid overlay

parameters.name: Mapped_IMovieP
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Azimuthal projection to geographic (fixed sun orientation)

parameters.name: Mapped_IMovieM
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Azimuthal projection to magnetic LT and invariant lat

parameters.name: Sensor
parameters.description: Sensor number: 0=Earth Camera,1=Low Resolution Camera,2=Medium Resolution Camera

parameters.name: PPitch
parameters.description: Platform pointing angle from nadir

parameters.name: SC_Pos_GCI
parameters.description: GCI position vector of Polar spacecraft in kilometers.

parameters.name: SC_Vel_GCI
parameters.description: GCI velocity vector of Polar spacecraft in km/sec.

parameters.name: SC_SpinV_GCI
parameters.description: GCI spin axis unit vector of Polar spacecraft.

parameters.name: Headers
parameters.description: Image header bytes
